headline: Founder and Director of Master's Touch Leadership Development Ministries
summary: I am an Author, Writer, Blogger and Speaker.  I fully believe in motivating others to their maximum potential in life through my publications.

defaultPosition.description: Masterâs Touch Leadership Development Ministries exists and operates to build, equip, and empower people to reach their maximum potential in life through the inspired Word of God. Training and development in the Word of God. Promoting relationships through the Word by discipleship, mentorship and encouragement that will introduce the Heart of Christ to the World in Excellency. Advancing the Kingdom of God through Teaching, Motivation, Team Building,  Conferences and Seminars.  Our goal is to evangelize and build bridges between different nationalities and denominations.

positions.description: â¢Heartfelt Blogtalk is a blog designed to express the heart of a Woman and In this blog we will explore a womanâs origin and how God intended for her to be viewed and experienced. Iâve seen so many women on television, in movies, in the workplace and even at home being exploited, used and in many cases suffering abuse in their relationships.  There are so many different ways a woman is thought about and spoken of in our world and society. She is an object of most menâs desires and fantasies. She is used for many other reasons too, but sex is the greatest. With all the reasons a man can want a woman; God had nothing but a great design, great intentions and great expectations when he created a woman.  so, when you get an opportunity blog with me express your thoughts with me as a woman.  Men, express your thoughts as well.  I would absolutely love to hear from you on my site.
positions.title: Founder and CEO

positions.description: I am an Author, Writer, Speaker and Blogger. I have been a wife for the past thirty-seven years. . I love God and am passionate about the will of God being produced in the lives of others. I author books based on the premise, promise and purpose of God's will for our lives. I am an Author who loves authoring Christian Books about Leadership Development in the Body of Christ, Marriage and Relationships.  Follow me at http://amazon.com/author/cynthiamcgee
positions.title: Cynthia R. McGee

positions.description: Processes and serves a variety of legal documents such as legal motions, subpoenas, orders, and complaints.  Uses DMV records and other computerized systems to locate individuals.  Obtains police reports, fingerprints  and background checks .   Reviews criminal histories and backgrounds. Performs data entry into the process tracking system to update records of subpoena service.  Prepares written and statistical reports for use in investigations
positions.title: Investigative Assistant
